overview: Soon enough humankind will ascend to space. Who can join that mission? Who has to stay behind?  In some places it has already started. Men and machine taking flight, leaving for the unknown future. For the endless void.  That’s where they meet. The People using machines to clean machines and the people sheltered inside those machines.  Destined to collide, never to engage.  Welcome to Europes biggest car wash.
tagline: About people wielding machines to clean machines and people sitting in those machines. Destined to collide, never to engage. Welcome to Europes biggest car wash.
title: The Astronauts of Feuerbach
